properties.abstract: The journey to the very end of Sertigtal is already an event, as Sertig is a Walser valley in pristine condition. It is located in a mountainous world which is characteristic for the Grisons: a number of small valleys formed by now dwindling glaciers lead up to schistose threethousanders with views beyond the borders of Switzerland.
properties.subtitle: In the heart of the Grisons
properties.title: From Sertig Sand

sac_photos.title: The last metres to the main summit of Älplihorn
A view deep down while ascending, in the background is the Ducan range.
On Chrachenhorn, a rewarding neighbour summit of Älplihorn. In the background is Älplihorn (the ascent is on the face to the right).

segments.description: From Sertig Walserhuus go to the hamlet of Grossalp. Now follow a faint path in steep pastures to reach the Alpeli plain.
segments.title: Walserhuus - Alpeli

segments.description: From Alpeli ascend in glacier schrofen until the summit head of Älplihorn. In a talus interspersed with big boulders go westward to reach the south ridge, which rises from Bärentällifurgga to merge with the south-west ridge. Ascend, at first easily, then exposed (go off the ridge line, slightly sidestepping onto the west face, T5), you reach the summit.
segments.title: Alpeli - Älplihorn

segments.description: The descent is back to Bärentällifurgge on the ascent route. Now, in steep talus go directly down to a picturesque small lake in Bärentälli and continue pathless southward to Fanezfurgga in glacier schrofen.
segments.title: Älplihorn – Fanezfurgga

segments.description: You easily reach Sertig on a hiking trail in Ducantal.
segments.title: Fanezfurgga - Sertig

segments.description: Ascent and descent can also be undertaken from Monstein (1636 m) via Fanezmeder. Hike in Mitteltälli directly to Mitteltälligrat (south-west ridge): 1400 metres of vertical height. T4 and 7 h until the south-west ridge. Chrachenhorn can be accessed via Rüggschboden and following the scree-covered north-west ridge (1200 metres of vertical height, 6 h, T4).
segments.title: Variant: from/to Monstein
